headline: Is Molson Coors (TAP) Price Missing The Mark After Recent Brand Portfolio Reassessment?
summary: If you are wondering whether Molson Coors Beverage is attractively priced right now, its current set of valuation checks gives a clear starting point for that assessment. The share price sits at US$50.64 after a 7.2% return over the past week, 5.9% over the past month and 6.8% year to date, while the 1-year return of a 4.5% decline contrasts with 12.3% and 14.9% gains over 3 and 5 years respectively. Recent news coverage has focused on Molson Coors Beverage in the context of its long-term...
